content: this crochet blanket is made with the thermal stitch which creates a solid fabric that is perfect making warm crochet blankets this crochet bag features a santa and christmas theme **the pattern can be purchased here as an ad-free printer-friendly pdf ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 400 adfree patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership > here 1 ***you can also get this pattern in a thermal crochet ebook with many more crochet patterns and lots of tutorials and tips right here 2 *** 1 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/the-crochet-club/ ref=ravelry 2 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/thermal-crochet-made-easy/ ref=ravelry
